verses.verse: How he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>;
Surely I will not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor go <S%H5927>up<s%> into my <S%H6210>bed<s%>;
I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8153>sleep<s%> to my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, or <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to my <S%H6079>eyelids<s%>,
Until I find <S%H4672>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, a <S%H4908>habitation<s%> for the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
<S%H8085>Behold<s%>, we heard of it at <S%H672>Ephratah<s%>: we <S%H4672>found<s%> it in the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood<s%>.
We will <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>: we will <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H1916>footstool<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, into your <S%H4496>rest<s%>; <S%H727>you<s%>, and the ark of your <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
Let your <S%H3548>priests<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; and let your <S%H2623>saints<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%>.
For your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s sake turn not <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of your <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>; he will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H6529>it<s%>; Of the fruit of your <S%H990>body<s%> will I <S%H7896>set<s%> upon your <S%H3678>throne<s%>.

If your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and my <S%H5713>testimony<s%> <S%H2090>that<s%> I shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H1121>them<s%>, their sons shall also <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon your <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H5703>evermore<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; he has <S%H183>desired<s%> it for his <S%H4186>habitation<s%>.
This is my <S%H4496>rest<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: here will I <S%H3427>live<s%>; for I have desired <S%H183>it<s%>.
I will <S%H1288>abundantly<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> her <S%H6718>provision<s%>: I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> her <S%H34>poor<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
I will also <S%H3847>clothe<s%> her <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H3468>salvation<s%>: and her <S%H2623>saints<s%> shall shout <S%H7442>aloud<s%> for <S%H7444>joy<s%>.
There will I <S%H6779>make<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6779>bud<s%>: I have <S%H6186>ordained<s%> a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> for my <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
His <S%H341>enemies<s%> will I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%>: but upon himself shall his <S%H5145>crown<s%> <S%H6692>flourish<s%>.
